text.text: THE NANPUSUSPENSION BRIDGE ISTHE TRAFFIC ARTERYLINKING PUDONG ANDPUXI TOGETHER
南浦大桥是连接浦东和浦西的交通大动脉。
B.Iarrived here anhour ago.I came by theNanpu Suspension Bridge.
我一小时前就到了。我是从南浦在桥过来的。　 A.Wait…wait…WhichBridge?　 等一下，什么桥?
B.The NanpuSuspension Bridge.It's a newone.It is the traffic arterylinking Pudong and Puxitogether.
南浦大桥。这是座新桥。它是连接浦东和浦西的交通大动脉。
